[new] [if !session arg] No argument given. [elsif session arg =~ /^\/|\.\./]

Why would you do something naughtylike putting a leading slash or a .. in your URL? HMM???? I will use a new feature: Log("Attack from " . $Session->{remote_addr}). [mvasp] <% Log($Session->{remote_addr}) %>[/mvasp] [/elsif] [else] [file name="pages/[data session arg]"] [/else] [/if]
